Diet Plan:
Allowed Foods:
- Low-sugar fruits: Avocado, lemons, limes
- Non-starchy vegetables: Artichokes, broccoli, kale, tomatoes
- Gluten-free grains: Teff, quinoa, oat bran
- Healthy fats: Avocado, olives, coconut oil
- Probiotic foods: Yogurt, kefir, sauerkraut
- Lean proteins: Chicken, turkey, fish (salmon, sardines)
- Herbs & spices: Garlic, ginger, turmeric
Avoid Foods:
- Sugar & refined carbs: White bread, cakes, sodas
- Processed foods: Packaged snacks, fast food
- Dairy (except probiotic sources)

Allowed Foods:
- Lean meats: Chicken, turkey, fish
- Whole grains: Brown rice, oats, quinoa
- Vegetables: Broccoli, spinach, carrots, bell peppers
- Fruits: Apples, pears, berries (avoid citrus if allergic)
- Nuts & seeds: Almonds, walnuts, chia seeds
Avoid Foods:
- Common allergens: Dairy, eggs, peanuts, shellfish, soy
- Processed foods with artificial additives
- Alcohol & caffeine (can worsen reactions)

Allowed Foods:
- Complex carbohydrates: Oatmeal, brown rice, whole wheat bread
- Lean proteins: Skinless poultry, fish, tofu, lentils
- Vegetables: Green leafy vegetables, zucchini, carrots
- Fruits: Bananas, melons, apples, pears (avoid acidic ones)
- Healthy fats: Olive oil, flaxseeds, almonds
Avoid Foods:
- Spicy, acidic foods: Tomatoes, citrus, chili peppers
- Caffeinated & carbonated drinks
- Fried & high-fat foods

Allowed Foods:
- High-fiber foods: Whole grains, beans, lentils
- Vegetables: Broccoli, carrots, kale, asparagus
- Fruits: Apples, papaya, watermelon, berries
- Lean proteins: Chicken, fish, tofu
- Healthy fats: Nuts, olive oil, avocado
Avoid Foods:
- High-fat, fried foods
- Alcohol & processed meats
- Excess salt & sugar

Allowed Foods:
- Leafy greens: Spinach, kale (help detoxify)
- Antioxidant-rich foods: Blueberries, turmeric, ginger
- Hydration: Coconut water, herbal teas, plenty of water

- Lean proteins: Chicken, fish, tofu 
Avoid Foods:
- Alcohol & caffeine

- Processed foods with artificial additives
